posts.postText: Is the current minecraft server going to be a clean, unmodded, server? cause its rly hard to find a clean, unmodded server. I would like if the server could essentially be like singleplayer with friends, so that u can make your civilization as a team
There are few mods, none really affect the the gameplay.

>> Is the current minecraft server going to be a clean, unmodded, server? cause its rly hard to find a clean, unmodded server. I would like if the server could essentially be like singleplayer with friends, so that u can make your civilization as a teamâ€‰
